text:
Hey Kim! No worries! I do have some work that I can share, the following links should be to the artstation pages of my last 3 assignments. :slightly_smiling_face: 

<https://artstn.co/p/DxNlG0>
<https://artstn.co/p/Bmk8z4>
<https://artstn.co/p/w80wV5>

attachments.title: Unity Island Project, Ryan Clark
attachments.text: A walk around video and collection of assets from my latest Uni project, had to create a themed Island using a mixture of traditional modelling techniques and photogrammetry, and present it inside of Unity. Models created in Maya, Textured in Substance Painter and photogrammetry in PhotoscanPro, with retopology done in Maya.
attachments.fallback: ArtStation: Unity Island Project, Ryan Clark

attachments.title: 1970's Formula 1 Pit Lane - 'Time Leap' Project, Ryan Clark
attachments.text: A couple of renders of a 1970's inspired F1 pit lane for my latest Uni project. Very pleased with the final results!
attachments.fallback: ArtStation: 1970's Formula 1 Pit Lane - 'Time Leap' Project, Ryan Clark

attachments.title: New York City Skyline Project, Ryan Clark
attachments.text: A handful of renders from my latest university project. Had to model a scene based upon the New York City skyline. Pretty pleased with how this turned out, especially getting to grips with Substance Painter and Nuke for the first time.
attachments.fallback: ArtStation: New York City Skyline Project, Ryan Clark
